name: Battle Billiard Galactic Edition
description:
WARNING: Use Firefox for the web build for the moment!

WHAT YOU SHOULD KNOW:

  • Force rockets to collide for bonus points!
  • When entering target mode move the mouse cursor into the yellow circle around enemies to activate the crosshair.
  • No matter what the UI implies: the rockets don’t auto-aim! You hit were you aim at!

You like violence and billiard? This game is made for you.

Shortcuts:

  • Mute audio: CTRL + M
  • Toggle fullscreen: F11

The builds aren't signed do don't worry if your OS shows a warning.

Thanks to Juhani Junkala for providing the background music loop.

[UPDATE 25.08.2018]
Today I release the first post LD version of this game. It includes changes to visual presentation, bug fixes, tweaks and recommendations from testers, controller support and more. It's meant for people that played the original version, the tutorial is *not* included in this build!

If you want to play with a controller (example controls from XBOX controller):

  • Left stick to move
  • Right stick to aim
  • LT toggles aim mode
  • RT shoots
  • A to boost
  • Start to pause, X in pause menu exits the game

Keyboard shortcuts to mute sound or toggle fullscreen are still valid. No web build for the moment.
